All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CertificateDto
This class represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for a certificate.
CertificateMapper
This interface maps Certificate and CertificateDto objects to each other.
CertificateService
This class represents the service layer of the certificate entity in the application.
ExceptionMessages
An enum that stores exception messages used in the project
FilterMapper
This is a mapper interface that maps filter and sort DTOs to corresponding filter and sort objects.
ModificationException
Exception thrown when a modification operation on a resource fails.
NotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the requested resource is not found.
SearchFilterDto
 
ServiceConfig
This class is a Spring configuration class that enables component scanning for the com.epam.esm package.
SortFilterDto
 
TagDto
This class represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for a tag.
TagMapper
This interface maps Tag and TagDto objects to each other.
TagService
The TagService class provides methods to perform CRD operations on the Tag entity.
